typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Your contribution would exceed the total amount requested."

arguments.value: Your contribution would exceed the total amount requested.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Your contribution would exceed the total amount requested."

nodes.documentation: @dev During the crowdfund, anyone can fund and get repayment rights in proportion to their contribution
nodes.name: fund

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Withdrawal will lead to repayment inbalance"

arguments.value: Withdrawal will lead to repayment inbalance

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Withdrawal will lead to repayment inbalance"

nodes.documentation:
@dev Borrower can withdraw currently aquired principal in any proportion, and any time during the crowdfund for flexibility.
 This DOES NOT affect the total principal that can be raised or the loan terms, it merely provides cash flow.
nodes.name: withdrawPrincipal

nodes.documentation: @dev Anyone can make repayments on behalf of the borrower
nodes.name: repay

nodes.documentation: @dev Lenders can withdraw their proportional stake from repayments after the crowdfund ends
nodes.name: withdrawRepayment

nodes.documentation: @dev Borrower can start the crowdfund once
nodes.name: startCrowdfund

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the borrower can call function."

arguments.value: Only the borrower can call function.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the borrower can call function."
